description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Final Rift is a 3D game of space adventure and exploration. Collect bounties! Encounter pirates, aliens and galactic wars! Upgrade your ship to be the most fearsome fighting vessel in the Universe!  Proceed deeper into rift space and help civilisations in perilous danger! Trade goods amongst the stars and meet your fate at the Final Rift!
description.short: Final Rift is a 3D game of space adventure and exploration. Collect bounties! Encounter pirates, aliens and galactic wars! Upgrade your ship to be the most fearsome fighting vessel in the Universe!  Proceed deeper into rift space and help civilisations in perilous danger! Trade goods amongst the stars and meet your fate at the Final Rift!
